sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 6. Install the items identified in the email from IT

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Task 6. Install any of the items described in the email from IT^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0867509^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=You will receive an email from IT. Install any of the items described in the email. ^u_string_2=They will confirm you have the necessary software and drivers installed and confirm your identity. Be prepared to show a different set of required ID evidence for authorization by IT.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Close Regulated Market access request

sys_variable_value.value: approval=Closed Complete^close_notes=Request for access to a ServiceNow Regulated Market environment has been approved, configured and closed successfully.﻿^=

sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"close_notes":{"scriptActive":false,"savedValue":"Request for access to a ServiceNow Regulated Market environment has been approved, configured and closed successfully.﻿"}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 5. Request a SNCA v3 account

sys_element_mapping.value:
short_description=Task 5. Request a SNCA v3 Account ^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0955147^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=Create a Catalog Request in Surf for the specific Restricted environment (includes Token, VPN, LDAP, and SNCA):
Request a SNCA v3 Account.^u_string_2=Your Manager Approves Access.
The IAM Team confirms you have completed the above training and creates your VPN and LDAP accounts.
IT assigns a token to your RSA account and reaches out to you to mail the token and set up a Zoom meeting during which you will provide identification evidence and set up SNCA and Token Access. Be prepared to show a different set of required ID evidence for authorization by IT.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 1. Manager requests US FedPass for GCC or NSC

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=Task 1. Request U.S. Fed Pass for GCC and/or NSC for your employee.^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by.manager}}^u_task_instructions=https://surf.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fkb_view.do%3Fsysparm_article%3DKB0047748^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=For GCC and NSC: Your manager should: Request U.S. Fed Pass for GCC and/or NSC (Surf).^u_string_2=GCC & NSC: Facility Security Officer (FSO) processes your manager's request and confirms you have completed your Background Screening with HR. A FSO ticket is emailed to you for completion.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Request Manager's approval
Task 3. Complete & return FSO form

sys_element_mapping.value:
parent={{Created_1.current}}^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^short_description=Task 3. Complete & return the form that was emailed from FSO along with identification evidence.^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0867509^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=Complete the FSO ticket sent via email (instructions provided on the ticket). You will need to provide your identification evidence for personnel authorization in the ticket.
Please complete this form and return it to FSO.﻿^u_string_2=For GCC and NSC Employees: FSO processes the ticket.
Complete this step to become authorized and receive your Federal Identity (Restricted Environment Username).

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Notify the requester via email, that their request has completed successfully.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Your access to Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Regulated markets has successfully completed.

Your request is now closed.

Your next steps will be to access the SNCA v3 virtual desktop, connect with wavevpn and successfully log into HIWAVE.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 4. Complete Required Training

sys_element_mapping.value:
short_description=Task 4. Complete the required training in the Learning Portal:^u_task_instructions=https://servicenow.sabacloud.com/Saba/Web_spf/NA1PRD0015/app/shared;spf-url=common%2Flearningeventdetail%2Fcrtfy000000003808606^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=Complete the required training in the Learning Portal:
General Security Awareness Training (GSAT) - New Hire Certification and Annual Certification
US Federal Environments Access Certification
*Additional trainings may be required for the specific hosting option.^u_string_2=If your US Fed Pass is authorized and required training is complete, FSO adds you as a user in the IAM environment. The IAM Team emails your Federal Identity (Restricted Environment Username) to you.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 7. Configure & use your new SNCA v3 account

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Task 7. Configure & use your new SNCA v3 account^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0870929^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=Configure & use your new SNCA v3 account^u_string_2=A working connection to the Citrix virtual desktop enviornment (SNCA v3)

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 2. Gather your identification evidence for personnel authorization.

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Task 2. Gather your identification evidence for personnel authorization.^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0867509^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=For GCC and NSC: Be prepared: Gather your identification evidence for personnel authorization. Requirements: U.S. citizen or permanent resident on U.S. soil.^u_string_2=The GCC and NSC (in the United States) and ServiceNow Protected Platform-Australia environments have specific identification requirements for authorized personnel access.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 4. Complete Required Training

sys_element_mapping.value:
short_description=Task 4. Complete the required training in the Learning Portal:^u_task_instructions=https://servicenow.sabacloud.com/Saba/Web_spf/NA1PRD0015/app/shared;spf-url=common%2Flearningeventdetail%2Fcrtfy000000003808606^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=Complete the required training in the Learning Portal:
General Security Awareness Training (GSAT) - New Hire Certification and Annual Certification
US Federal Environments Access Certification
*Additional trainings may be required for the specific hosting option.^u_string_2=If your US Fed Pass is authorized and required training is complete, FSO adds you as a user in the IAM environment. The IAM Team emails your Federal Identity (Restricted Environment Username) to you.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 7. Configure & use your new SNCA v3 account

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Task 7. Configure & use your new SNCA v3 account^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0870929^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=Configure & use your new SNCA v3 account^u_string_2=A working connection to the Citrix virtual desktop enviornment (SNCA v3)

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 6. Install the items identified in the email from IT

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Task 6. Install any of the items described in the email from IT^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0867509^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=You will receive an email from IT. Install any of the items described in the email. ^u_string_2=They will confirm you have the necessary software and drivers installed and confirm your identity. Be prepared to show a different set of required ID evidence for authorization by IT.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 5. Request a SNCA v3 account

sys_element_mapping.value:
short_description=Task 5. Request a SNCA v3 Account ^u_task_instructions=https://support.servicenow.com/kb?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0955147^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^parent={{Created_1.current}}^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=Create a Catalog Request in Surf for the specific Restricted environment (includes Token, VPN, LDAP, and SNCA):
Request a SNCA v3 Account.^u_string_2=Your Manager Approves Access.
The IAM Team confirms you have completed the above training and creates your VPN and LDAP accounts.
IT assigns a token to your RSA account and reaches out to you to mail the token and set up a Zoom meeting during which you will provide identification evidence and set up SNCA and Token Access. Be prepared to show a different set of required ID evidence for authorization by IT.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Notify the requester via email, that their request has completed successfully.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Your access to Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Regulated markets has successfully completed.

Your request is now closed.

Your next steps will be to access the SNCA v3 virtual desktop, connect with wavevpn and successfully log into HIWAVE.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 1. Manager requests US FedPass for GCC or NSC

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=Task 1. Request U.S. Fed Pass for GCC and/or NSC for your employee.^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by.manager}}^u_task_instructions=https://surf.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fkb_view.do%3Fsysparm_article%3DKB0047748^u_regulated_market_requested={{Created_1.current.regulated_markets}}^u_string_3=For GCC and NSC: Your manager should: Request U.S. Fed Pass for GCC and/or NSC (Surf).^u_string_2=GCC & NSC: Facility Security Officer (FSO) processes your manager's request and confirms you have completed your Background Screening with HR. A FSO ticket is emailed to you for completion.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Task 3. Complete & return FSO form

sys_element_mapping.value:
parent={{Created_1.current}}^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.opened_by}}^short_description=Task 3.
